body:
Is your rep going down by the hundreds? Can you no longer have a pfp or create guilds? Are you just annoyed that your posts are being astroturfed by someone who was annoyed with you?

The temporary solution to this potential problem is to just make your profile private. Your posts likely have only -5 rep, but if 5 of your posts and/or comments have that same amount, you'll quickly reach -25 rep, and so on and so on.

Nah fuck that, I made my profile public deliberately because I dont give a shit about meme points and do give a huge shit about making people assmad about my posting history

A few days ago I got downvoted from 2600 to below the magical -5... until early this morning when over the course of a couple hours I got voted back up to over 2600 again.

This fucking website! You can't beat it.

body:
Same.  I stand by what I fucking say.  I used to be fucking vile on Twitter and reddit but here everyone is so willing to have a conversation I have zero need to be mean spirited.  It's been really nice honestly.  Although, I totally understand how users don't like all the politics and how much of that is right leaning.  I truly get it, but for someone like myself who enjoys politics and is lib right, I don't mind it.

And I definitely have been trying to post more content in various subs to offer something else to look at.

body:
I don’t care that much about internet points. & if someone finds something in my history that contradicts what I just posted/commented then that will give me the opportunity to explain where I was & where I am now. It will also help keep me accountable. It’s easy to be critical of someone else, it’s difficult to look at yourself with that same critical eye. 

I may get downvoted & brigaded at some point; but I have faith in the platform and the people who use it. It won’t stay that way for long; you’ll eventually be uprepped. The trolls and downrep brigades will get board & good content, comments, & upreps will prevail.

post.body:
Is your rep going down by the hundreds? Can you no longer have a pfp or create guilds? Are you just annoyed that your posts are being astroturfed by someone who was annoyed with you?

The temporary solution to this potential problem is to just make your profile private. Your posts likely have only -5 rep, but if 5 of your posts and/or comments have that same amount, you'll quickly reach -25 rep, and so on and so on.

Not lying, I contributed. I spent 30-40 minutes downvoting every single post of his. He went from 1700 to -5. Why? I was waiting and had nothing to do. It killed time.

Seeing his rep go from 1700 to -5 and back up to 2400... It’s fun. This place must be a roller coaster of emotions for him.

The temporary solution to this potential problem is to just make your profile private. Your posts likely have only -5 rep, but if 5 of your posts and/or comments have that same amount, you'll quickly reach -25 rep, and so on and so on.
post.title: Just make your profile private

post.body:
Is your rep going down by the hundreds? Can you no longer have a pfp or create guilds? Are you just annoyed that your posts are being astroturfed by someone who was annoyed with you?

The temporary solution to this potential problem is to just make your profile private. Your posts likely have only -5 rep, but if 5 of your posts and/or comments have that same amount, you'll quickly reach -25 rep, and so on and so on.
